import React, {useState} from 'react' import Context from '../context' import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' class Edit extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props) this.state ={ show: false, } }; render(){ const testObj = {id: '1', name: 'Test', lastname: 'Test', age: 1, gender: 'Male'} const {removeUser, editUser} = this.context const handleClose = () => this.setState({show: false}); const handleShow = () => this.setState({show:true}); const saveAndClose = (userObj) => { editUser(userObj) handleClose() } edditedUser = {} edditedUser.name = this.props.name edditedUser.lastname = this.props.lastname edditedUser.age = this.props.age edditedUser.gender = this.props.gender return( <>

User: {this.props.user.id} Test: {testObj.id}

Name edditedUser.name = event.target.value}/> Lastname edditedUser.lastname = event.target.value}/> Age edditedUser.age = event.target.value}/> Gender edditedUser.gender = event.target.value}>
) }} Edit.contextType = Context export default Edit
